messages.content: The Green Party is the only remain party standing in Dulwich and West Norwood. The Lib Dems have stood aside for Jonathan Bartley so a remain party MP can be elected here. Let's make history and elect London's first Green MP!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Green Party is the only Remain party standing in Dulwich and West Norwood. Greens will give power back to people to decide the way forward with a People’s Vote and campaign to Remain in the EU for the benefit of everyone.

Greens have led the way for years on tackling climate chaos. We will oppose airport expansion, fossil fuel subsidies and new road building. Our Green New Deal is the real deal bringing cheaper energy, better public transport, warmer homes and hundreds of thousands of new jobs.
The Green Party will stand up to Labour’s estate demolitions in Dulwich and West Norwood and make sure that precious local green spaces are protected and kept open to all.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Lib Dems have stood aside for Jonathan Bartley so a remain party MP can be elected here.

community.content: The Green Party will stand up to Labour’s estate demolitions in Dulwich and West Norwood and make sure that precious local green spaces are protected and kept open to all.

endorsements.endorsement: Only the Green Party will prevent climate chaos and transform Britain whilst remaining in the EU. I want Dulwich and West Norwood to make history and elect Jonathan, as London’s first Green MP, to join me in the House of Commons.

We will oppose airport expansion, fossil fuel subsidies and new road building.
Our Green New Deal is the real deal bringing cheaper energy, better public transport, warmer homes and hundreds of thousands of new jobs.

Only the Green Party will prevent climate chaos and transform Britain whilst remaining in the EU. I want Dulwich and West Norwood to make history and elect Jonathan, as London’s first Green MP, to join me in the House of Commons.
